channel.title: Homeassitant on Mike Webb Tech
channel.description: Recent content in Homeassitant on Mike Webb Tech

item.title: BLAH no Series 2
item.description:
Embracing the Speed and Simplicity of Hugo

As I navigate the ever-evolving landscape of technology, I’m always on the lookout for tools that are efficient, powerful, and enjoyable to use. When it came to building this digital space to document my learning journey in cloud computing, networking, cybersecurity, and beyond, I landed on Hugo, a static site generator, and I haven’t looked back

item.title: Diving into Hugo
item.description: Exploring the power and simplicity of Hugo, the static site generator that powers this blog. Learn about my experiences and why I chose Hugo for my journey in tech.

item.title: DB30 done and dusted
item.description: Got the official end of contract in the mail the other day, so thayts all folks for the topside work on the barge. McD’s were making noises that sounded like there was sat support comming up for air divers, but thats all it turned out to be..just noise. Oh well funn was had and money made by all.
